languages.text: "Ну уж нет. Отряд блюстителей, конечно, спугнет мерзавцев. Но я не отпущу тебя одну, служительница смерти. Мы отправимся в техотсек вместе. И вместе повяжем тех, кто посмел оскорбить Лорд-капитана".

"Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Ну уж нет. Отряд блюстителей, конечно, спугнет мерзавцев. Но я не отпущу тебя одну, служительница смерти. Мы отправимся в техотсек вместе. И вместе повяжем тех, кто посмел оскорбить Лорд-капитана".

traits.locale_text: "Out of the question. The enforcers will certainly spook the bastards, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. We will go to the technical bay together. And it will be together that we will bring down those who dare insult the Lord Captain."

"Out of the question. The enforcers will certainly spook the bastards, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. We will go to the technical bay together. And it will be together that we will bring down those who dare insult the Lord Captain."

"Out of the question. The enforcers will certainly spook the bastards, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. We will go to the technical bay together, and together we will bring down all who dare insult the Lord Captain."

"Out of the question. The enforcers will certainly spook the bastards, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. We will go to the technical bay together, and together we will bring down all who dare insult the Lord Captain."

"Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

"Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Kommt nicht infrage. Ein Trupp von Enforcern würde das Ungeziefer mit Sicherheit verjagen, aber ich lass Euch nicht alleine gehen, Dienerin des Todes. Ihr und ich werden gemeinsam zu den Kammern gehen, und wir werden gemeinsam alle zu Fall bringen, die es gewagt haben, den Lord Captain zu beleidigen."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Kommt nicht infrage. Ein Trupp von Enforcern würde das Ungeziefer mit Sicherheit verjagen, aber ich lass Euch nicht alleine gehen, Dienerin des Todes. Ihr und ich werden gemeinsam zu den Kammern gehen, und wir werden gemeinsam alle zu Fall bringen, die es gewagt haben, den Lord Captain zu beleidigen."

languages.text: «Ni hablar. Es verdad que una escuadra de guardias espantaría a las alimañas, pero no pienso dejar que vaya sola, sierva de la muerte. Yo la acompañaré a las cámaras y acabaremos con quienes han osado insultar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Ni hablar. Es verdad que una escuadra de guardias espantaría a las alimañas, pero no pienso dejar que vaya sola, sierva de la muerte. Yo la acompañaré a las cámaras y acabaremos con quienes han osado insultar {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「問題外だ。エンフォーサーの部隊なら害虫を追い払えるだろうけど、あなたを一人で行かせるわけにはいかないのだ、死の従者よ。私は共に現場へ行って、一緒にロード・キャプテンを侮辱した者どもを皆殺しにしてやろう」
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「問題外だ。エンフォーサーの部隊なら害虫を追い払えるだろうけど、あなたを一人で行かせるわけにはいかないのだ、死の従者よ。私は共に現場へ行って、一緒にロード・キャプテンを侮辱した者どもを皆殺しにしてやろう」

languages.text: “想都别想。如果派出一整支执法者小队，那确实会吓跑那些害虫，但我绝对不会让你一个人过去，死亡的仆人。我会和你一起前往等离子驱动室，一起干掉那些胆敢侮辱舰长大人的人渣。”
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “想都别想。如果派出一整支执法者小队，那确实会吓跑那些害虫，但我绝对不会让你一个人过去，死亡的仆人。我会和你一起前往等离子驱动室，一起干掉那些胆敢侮辱舰长大人的人渣。”

languages.text: « Hors de question. Une escouade de prévôts effraierait certainement la vermine, mais je ne vous laisserai pas y aller seule, servante de la mort. Nous irons ensemble dans ces compartiments et nous châtierons ceux qui ont osé insulter {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Hors de question. Une escouade de prévôts effraierait certainement la vermine, mais je ne vous laisserai pas y aller seule, servante de la mort. Nous irons ensemble dans ces compartiments et nous châtierons ceux qui ont osé insulter {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "Söz konusu bile olamaz. Bir infazcı mangası, muhakkak ki parazitleri korkutup kaçıracaktır. Ancak yalnız gitmene de izin veremem ölümün hizmetkârı. Odalara ikimiz birlikte gideceğiz ve Lord Kaptan'ı aşağılamaya cüret edenleri birlikte alaşağı edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Out of the question. An enforcer squad would certainly scare off the vermin, but I am not letting you go alone, servant of death. You and I will go to the chambers together, and together we will bring down all who have dared to insult the Lord Captain."
